message: A weight drops down on my hips. At the same time, something closes around my throat.
I snap back to reality. Mink is on top of me, choking me with both hands.

name: ミンク
message: "Look at me."
Mink commands in a growl as his thumbs press into my trachea.
An instinctive terror grips my heart. He's choking the life out of me, yet his face is perfectly calm.
He could kill me at any time without a moment's hesitation. Killing me would mean nothing to him.
And it's that, not his words, that truly terrifies me.
As I struggle to break his grip, Mink brings his lips to my ear.

name: ミンク
message: "Find what sleeps in the depths of your suffering. Find it and lay its true form bare."
Minks lips touch my ear, moving slowly with each of his words.
His voice lowers, until it's barely a breath.

name: ミンク
message: "Deep down, you know it too. You know how much easier it is to surrender, to give in, to sink into the mud."
To surrender... to let him dominate me... is easier?
Maybe... he's right.
It would be so much easier to just admit defeat. To forget what I want, to stop resisting, to accept whatever he says.
If I do that, I know...
...I'll be able to take pleasure in my suffering.
Defiance has brought me nothing but pain.
Maybe... I should just give up already.
The dangerous thought flashes through my mind.
It's such a sickly sweet temptation.
I know, from my wild youth, how comfortable it can be to just sink into depravity.
And how much it can hurt to fight it.
That's exactly why I've tried so hard to avoid temptation.
To lead a quiet, normal life...
But now, with my body and mind beaten to a pulp, I can't get the thought out of my mind.
Maybe that's what Mink is trying to draw out of me.
The part of me that will admit defeat, surrender, and do exactly as he says...

name: ミンク
message: "Abandon your pathetic excuse for pride. You can't beat me. You never will. You're mine."
...Maybe I've done enough.
I can't beat Mink. I never will.
So why not just admit defeat already?
Maybe I should just let it happen...
It's like a switch, flipping in my mind. A high, soft gasp escapes my mouth.
Mink's grip on my neck loosens. He stares into my eyes for a few seconds before bringing his face close to my neck.
I hear what sounds like sniffing before he lifts his head again.
There's a faint trace of a smile on his lips... At least, that's how it seems to me.

name: ミンク
message: "Good, just like that. See only me."
While his words sound almost sweet, they're anything but.
They're a declaration of victory, a demand for total, unconditional submission.
But by now, even the sting of defeat has faded. Now there is only the shiver of gooseflesh as Mink's command washes over me.
It's easier to just accept it.
